column4: pelo, would you be able to help? trying to get wireless running on a dell inspiron 8200 but the package i need is broken
should i submit a ticket? where?
pelo thanx, do you know anyone who can?
which pkg is broken?
bcm43xx-fwcutter
so a broadcom chipset?
i think...it's a default inspiron 8200, i'm assuming it's the same
i followed this thread: http://ubuntuforums.org/archive/index.php/t-415544.html
ok, how did you find out that the broken pkg is the one you need?
looking at link, one sec.
cool, thanks!
the fwcutter is for extracting the brdcom firmware. do you have the firmware?
i am not sure. how do i find out?
pelo, i will continue to ask the channel @ large; thanks!
one sec. looking at aptitude show bcm43xx-fwcutter
http://bcm43xx.berlios.de/ is the project page
thanks so much for the help!
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/WifiDocs/Driver/bcm43xx
i checkin' out the links
nice. I'm up to my armpits in an Ultrium 3583 right now, but I can try to help more if you need it.
thanks! i'll poke around and get back to you
